fightsoul.name: SNAKE
fightsoul.description: When attacking, it will regenerate. When attacked, will restore Rage.
fightsoul.description_es: Al atacar, se regenerará Rage. Cuando es atacado, restaurará Rage.

fightsoul.name: TURTLE
fightsoul.description: When attacking and being attacked, it will regenerate.
fightsoul.description_es: Al atacar y ser atacada, se regenerará Rage.

fightsoul.name: BEAR
fightsoul.description: The first turn when entering the battle will have a large amount of Rage. When attacking will restore Rage.
fightsoul.description_es: El primer turno al entrar en batalla tendrá una gran cantidad de Rage. Al atacar restaurará Rage.

fightsoul.name: TIGER
fightsoul.description: When the boxers of the enemy or our side die, they will rage. When attacked, will restore Rage.
fightsoul.description_es: Cuando los peleadores del enemigo o de nuestro bando mueran, gana Rage. Cuando es atacado, restaurará Rage.

fightsoul.name: TURTLE
fightsoul.description: When attacked, will restore Rage. When attacking will restore Rage.

fightsoul.name: TIGER

fightsoul.name: SPACE
fightsoul.description: In all modes, self-heal for 85 Rage. Igniz 02 Um 4 stars or more restores HP at the beginning of each turn.
fightsoul.description_es: En todos los modos, autorrecupérate  85 de Rage. Igniz 02 Um 4 estrellas o más restaura HP al comienzo de cada turno.
